unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.description: You don't have permission to access this page. Please contact your administrator if you need access.
unauthorized.needAccess: Need access to this feature? Contact your system administrator to request the necessary permissions.

validation.schoolCodeMin: School code must be at least 2 characters
validation.schoolNameMin: School name must be at least 3 characters
validation.maxStudentsMin: Maximum students must be at least 50

schools.confirmDeactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate
schools.confirmActivate: Are you sure you want to activate

schoolAdmins.subtitle: Manage school administrators

schoolAdmins.confirmDeactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate
schoolAdmins.confirmActivate: Are you sure you want to activate
schoolAdmins.errorStatusUpdate: Failed to update school admin status
schoolAdmins.passwordOptional: Leave empty to keep current password

permissions.title: Manage Permissions
permissions.subtitle: Configure user access permissions
permissions.errorUpdate: Failed to save permissions. Please try again.

academicYears.title: Academic Years Management
academicYears.subtitle: Manage academic years and sessions

validation.endDateAfterStart: End date must be after start date

academicYears.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete
academicYears.asActive: as the active academic year? This will deactivate other years.
academicYears.errorSetActive: Failed to set active academic year
academicYears.noYears: No academic years found. Create one to get started.
academicYears.tipMessage: The new academic year will be created as inactive. You can set it as active later using the 'Set Active' button.
academicYears.currentlyActive: This is the currently active academic year
academicYears.alreadyActive: This academic year is already active.
academicYears.cannotDeleteActive: Cannot delete the active academic year. Please activate another year first.
academicYears.cannotDeleteWithStudents: Cannot delete this year. Students are enrolled in this year.
academicYears.autoCreateClasses: Copy class structure from current year
academicYears.autoCreateClassesHint: Automatically copy all classes from the active year to the new year. Maintains consistent class structure.
academicYears.autoCreateClassesExample: Example: If 2024/2025 has classes 1A, 1J, 2A, 2J, then 2025/2026 will also have 1A, 1J, 2A, 2J.

grades.title: Grades Management
grades.subtitle: Manage school grades and levels

validation.gradeLevelRange: Grade level must be between 1 and 12

grades.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete
grades.noGrades: No grades found. Create one to get started.
grades.cannotDeleteWithClasses: Cannot delete this grade. It has classes assigned to it.
grades.cannotDeleteWithStudents: Cannot delete this grade. Students are enrolled in it.

classes.title: Classes Management
classes.subtitle: Manage school classes and assignments

validation.maxStudentsRange: Max students must be between 1 and 50

classes.noClasses: No classes found. Create one to get started.
classes.cannotDeleteWithStudents: Cannot delete this class. Students are enrolled.

attendance.title: Attendance Records
attendance.subtitle: View and manage attendance
attendance.noRecordsMessage: No attendance records for the selected date and filter.

training.title: Face Recognition Training
training.subtitle: Train the AI model to recognize students
training.step1Description: Add 3-5 clear face photos for each student
training.step2Description: Click the button below to train the AI
training.step3Description: Once trained, cameras can detect students automatically
training.trainingTimeNotice: This may take 30 seconds to a few minutes depending on the number of photos...
training.trainingFailed: Failed to train model. Please try again.
training.testRecognitionDescription: Upload a test photo to see if the model can recognize the student

settings.title: System Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure system parameters and preferences
settings.recognitionThresholdHint: Higher values require more accurate matches (recommended: 65-75%)
settings.processFrameIntervalHint: Process every Nth frame (higher = faster but less accurate)
settings.lateThresholdHint: Students arriving after this time will be marked as late
settings.enableParentNotificationsDesc: Send notifications to parents about attendance
settings.absentNotificationTimeHint: Time to send notifications for absent students

cameras.title: Camera Management
cameras.subtitle: Monitor and control cameras for face detection
cameras.noCamerasDesc: Add cameras to start monitoring student attendance
cameras.noCamerasMessage: Add cameras to start monitoring student attendance
cameras.startCameraError: Failed to start camera. Make sure the face recognition model is trained.
cameras.startAllError: Failed to start cameras. Make sure the face recognition model is trained.
cameras.confirmDeactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate this camera?
cameras.confirmDeactivateMessage: The camera will be stopped and hidden from the camera list.
cameras.confirmActivate: Are you sure you want to activate this camera?
cameras.confirmActivateMessage: The camera will be available for use.
cameras.addCameraModalSubtitle: Configure a new camera for monitoring
cameras.unableToGetSchool: Unable to determine school. Please log in again.
cameras.addCameraError: Failed to add camera. Please try again.
cameras.setupTip1: Ensure camera is accessible from this network
cameras.setupTip2: Test RTSP URL in VLC Media Player first
cameras.setupTip3: Use "0" for testing with your computer's webcam
cameras.setupTip4: Camera should have clear view of entry points
cameras.deviceSerialHint: Find this in camera Settings → Device Info → Serial Number
cameras.rtspRequired: RTSP URL is required for RTSP cameras
cameras.deviceSerialRequired: Device Serial is required for P6SAI cameras
cameras.p6saiSetupTip1: Configure webhook in camera to point to your backend
cameras.p6saiSetupTip2: Enroll student faces in camera's face library
cameras.p6saiSetupTip3: Person ID in camera must match StudentCode in database
cameras.p6saiSetupTip4: Enable snapshot images in camera settings
cameras.aiAutomaticDescription: Camera sends events automatically when faces are recognized

uploadPhotoModal.photoGuideline1: Upload 3-5 clear photos for best recognition
uploadPhotoModal.photoGuideline2: Face should be clearly visible and well-lit

managePhotoModal.NoPhotoMsg1: No photos found for this student
managePhotoModal.NoPhotoMsg2: Upload some photos to get started
managePhotoModal.aboutPhotoManagement1: are used for face recognition training
managePhotoModal.aboutPhotoManagement2: are excluded from training but kept in database

managePhotoModal.aboutPhotoManagement4: You can reactivate photos anytime if needed

result.summary: Students have been imported and enrolled in their respective classes:

enrollment.title: Student Enrollment
enrollment.subtitle: Enroll students to new academic year:
enrollment.info1: Students will be automatically promoted to the next grade level
enrollment.info2: Classes with matching names (e.g., 1J → 2J) will be assigned automatically
enrollment.info3: Grade 6 students will be marked as graduated and set inactive
enrollment.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to enroll all students? This action cannot be undone.
enrollment.alreadyCompletedMessage: Students have been successfully enrolled from {{from}} to {{to}}. {{count}} students are now in the new academic year.
